subject: Re: [LH] Go Fug Yourself takes on Alison Goldfrapp
body:
Donny Bravo  wrote:

> Alison Goldfrapp is a frighteningly ugly crossdresser, right?

Yeah, well I'm sure there are some photos of you too where you look like
a frighteningly ugly crossdresser.

I saw her live a few years ago and she was pretty and sang incredibly
well.

|>oug
